org.springframework.shell.support.table

Class TableHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.shell.support.table.TableHeader
  • Deprecated. 
    In favor of TableBuilder

    public class TableHeader
extends Object
    Defines table column headers used by Table.
    See Also:
    TableRenderer
